comprehensive_overview: PeakRanger is a peak-finding algorithm specifically designed for the accurate identification of transcription factor binding sites from ChIP-Seq data. It utilizes a dynamic programming approach to accurately model and detect enriched regions, providing a comprehensive analysis of transcription factor binding patterns.
core_features: 1. Identification of transcription factor binding sites from ChIP-Seq data. 2. Dynamic programming approach for accurate modeling. 3. Comprehensive analysis of enriched regions. 4. Visualization tools for peak identification and visualization.
